dependencies: Go standard library only (no third-party modules listed in go.mod): net/http, context, flag, log, os, os/signal, syscall, time, fmt, io (evidence: main.go, handlers.go, go.mod)
architectural_resources: Containerized web application / HTTP API (listens on configurable address, default :5678) (evidence: main.go, Dockerfile)
CI/CD pipeline for building binaries and Docker images (evidence: .github/workflows/*.yml)

AWS ECS service deployment restart (implies ECS cluster/service) (evidence: .github/workflows/buildandpush.yml: aws ecs update-service --cluster POC-Assesment-1 --service Poc-Assessment --force-new-deployment)
